Join our study group for R Data Science and Analysis enthusiasts! Dive into statistical modeling, data visualization, and machine learning with R. Collaborate on real-world projects, share insights, and enhance your skills in a supportive community. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced R user, our group offers a dynamic environment to explore the power of R for effective data analysis. Let's learn, code, and grow together! The book for the group is [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/)
